name: CarHazard
description:
Broke but determined, you have to drive a hundred miles for someone you deeply care about. Hitchhikers will pay your journey if you pick them up. Although every choice you make will have consequences. Be careful because nothing is what it seems and the unexpected is certainly your worst friend.

  • Multiple choices with 5 endings.
  • 8 characters you can take on hitchhike(the death and the cat will be available in the next update)
  • several stupid ways to die
  • C.M.Martin: Writer
  • Whiteocimum: Art
  • Hugo Kieffer: Code
